ask_about: a pizza with any size of the following: small, medium, large, extra large
any of the following for toppings: mushrooms, tomato, onion, cheese, olives, pepperoni
response: Sure, I've noted down your preference for pepperoni and mushrooms. However, we don't have an option for extra cheese as a topping. You can choose from cheese, mushrooms, pepper, ham, bacon, pepperoni, olives, corn, and chicken. Could you please confirm your toppings again?
